body_text:
Alternate solution for the items naming is to store history and filters under state.newState.recipeHistory and state.newState.recipeFilters. Would lead to even more new small files under the current directory structure.
I don't have a strong feeling one way or the other. This isn't a blocker.
body:
Alternate solution for the `items` naming is to store history and filters under `state.newState.recipeHistory` and `state.newState.recipeFilters`. Would lead to even more new small files under the current directory structure.

I don't have a strong feeling one way or the other. This isn't a blocker.
body_html:
Alternate solution for the items naming is to store history and filters under state.newState.recipeHistory and state.newState.recipeFilters. Would lead to even more new small files under the current directory structure.

I don't have a strong feeling one way or the other. This isn't a blocker.
